text: Hey <!here|@here> I have my paperless post invite ready to send and it’s looking fine but I don’t think sending to all@uncorked is going to work because we won’t get any information about who is attending
Liz had the great idea of just screenshotting our cute invite and then pasting it in the email and embedding a google form. That sounds good to me and seems like a good option :slightly_smiling_face:
Sounds great to me
That sounds like a good idea!
I’m going to send a test email to y’all in a few minutes. Let me know if you get it and what you think/anything you think I missed.
Kk
Argh… for no apparent reason because we are a company I can’t embed the form in an email :disappointed:
Could we do a gcal invite with the invitation embedded?
Probably :confused: but then I just made this form for nothing :disappointed:
I am out of time for right now… and I’m not really sure how to do the Google calendar thing. I can send along my form and somebody could pick it up? Or I can send my design from paperless post
That sounds good! Thanks for trying kaitlyn :slightly_smiling_face:
did y’all get anything? I tried to add you as collaborators
It’s in the drive DAC > Pride Parade 2017 > T-Shirt RSVP form
I think I may have figured out an okay way to do it
I’ll do that after my meeting and send you the test version
the form looks really nice!
I didn't get it :disappointed:
oh, it’s in the dac folder
hold on, I can send it ot you
Sorry lol!!!
Is it possible to have the pretty image come through in the email?
If not, NBD

Well another way we could do it is an old fashioned email with a link to a calendar event. That way, we can put in the image and whatever else we want. The downside is I don’t think we get a very good count of who’s going because they just copy it to their calendar.
Can't you do a link to the Google form in the email?

Like image
To register click here (link to Google form)
oh totally
we could do that :slightly_smiling_face:
ok, let me draft that real quick
Otay! You don't have to change it just b/c me. I just thought it would be nice to have the prett image in the email :slightly_smiling_face:
I totally agree!
if y’all are good with it, I”m going to send that test email that I sent you earlier today to all@uncorked :slightly_smiling_face:
sending in
sent
